name: catalogue-env_flood_climoPune_0
itemDescription: Data Model for flood sensor deployed in Pune City

dataModelSchema.describes: Flood Sensor data model for flood sensors deployed in Pune City.

deviceModelInfo.describes: Information about the flood sensing device

STATION_ID.describes: Sensing station ID as per the device data model

LASTUPDATEDATETIME.describes: Time when the last data was received from this device

SITE_STATUS.describes: Functional status of flood sensing site/station/device

DANGER.describes: Reference Danger Level setting for the given sensing station. If CUR_LEVEL is greater than DANGER then the flooding status is flagged as 'Danger'

ALERT.describes: Reference Alert Level setting for the given sensing station. If CUR_LEVEL is greater than ALERT then a flooding 'Alert' is generated

CUR_LEVEL.describes: Current flooding level  detected by a given sensing station. Sensing device uses 'REF_LEVEL' and 'M_DISTANCE' parameters to compute CUR_LEVEL

REF_LEVEL.describes: Parameter used to compute CUR_LEVEL. (Need further clarification)

M_DISTANCE.describes: Parameter used to compute CUR_LEVEL. (Need further clarification)
